name: Light Up!
description:
2d-platformer about an ordinary man who tries to bring colors back to the dark world by interacting objects.

Programming, Game Design & Story - Burak Kurkcu (@kurkcuburak, http://burakkurkcu.com)
Graphics & Story - Cansu Aslan (@cansuas)
Music & Sound Effects - Utku Yildiz (@xavrian)
